title: The chef bringing Korean food to the world
text: BING NEWS: Food preacher: Chef Edward Kwon's quest to globalize Korean food On this month's episode of Culinary Journeys, we follow celebrity chef Edward Kwon to Jeonju, a famous South Korean food city. Learn more about the show here: cnn.com/journeys.
